details.description: Contact Jobseekers Direct from Jobcentre Plus to find out about full, part-time or voluntary job vacancies
details.alternative_title: Contact Jobseekers Direct service from Jobcentre Plus
details.body:
Get help finding a job from the Jobseeker Direct service from Jobcentre Plus.

Jobseeker Direct

Telephone: 0845 606 0234
Textphone: 0845 605 5255
Monday to Friday 8am to 6pm

You can also use Jobcentre Plus job search online to look for full, part-time or voluntary work in Great Britain or abroad.

details.description: Includes job search, volunteering, apprenticeships and job offers
Includes holidays and finding a job
Jobseekerâ€™s Allowance (JSA) - including contribution-based JSA, income-based JSA, who is eligible, what you get and how to claim (including rapid reclaim)
Jobseekers can find a job using the Jobcentre Plus job search tool - also find voluntary work to gain new skills to help your job search
